series_title: Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) Audit and Evidential Packages: Correspondence
series_description: This series documents routine and unscheduled correspondence with the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS). This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, waivers, fiscal reports, and audit and evidential-package supporting documentation.

series_title: Long Term Care: Adult Technology Assisted Waiver Recipient Records
series_description: This series documents recipient enrollment in specialized care, long-stay hospital, and adult technology -assisted waiver programs. This series may include, but is not limited to: social assessments, psychological evaluations, plans of care, assessments, nurse or case manager notes, and correspondence.

series_title: Long Term Care: Children's Technology Waiver Recipient Records
series_description: This series documents medical information for Medicaid technology waiver recipients younger than 21 years of age. series may include, but is not limited to: social assessments, psychological evaluations, plans of care, monthly nurse or case manager notes, and correspondence.

series_title: Long Term Care: Provider Quality Management Review Records
series_description: This series documents the quality management review of a provider. This series may include, but is not limited to: notifications, nurse or case manager notes, preadmission/annual screening assessments, psychological evaluations, invoices, statements, requests for appeals or reconsideration, DMAS forms, and correspondence.

series_title: Quality Management Review (QMR) Audits and Waiver Evidential Packages
series_description: This series documents Quality Management Reviews(QMR) audits, both routine and unscheduled. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, renewals, appeals, minutes, interagency agreements, fiscal reports, evidentiary packages, and other QMR documentation
